actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to extend the State Taxation of Depositories Act.

summary.text: Amends the State Taxation of Depositories Act to extend the moratorium on the power of States to impose "doing-business" taxes on out-of-State depositories from September 12, 1976, to June 30, 1977.

titles.title: A bill to extend the State Taxation of Depositories Act.
